mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into data_collection
name, case_id, expect_time, dept, seqno, case_type, archive_no, card_no, account, case_date, contact_date, result_id, target_name, relation, collect_info, collect_time, mobile, tel_type, area, mobile, odv, remark,
expect_time, case_type, new_case, case_allot_time, case_status,
account_age, en_repay_amt, pay_name, pay_method, confim_name,
confim_time, money, balance, m_val, next_foll_date,
last_foll_date, count_follow, last_phone_time, leave_days,
reduce_amt, reduce_status, reduce_update_time, reduce_refer_time,
color, bail_date, measure, method, repay_time,
bank_time, bank_amt, repay_amt, collect_status, complete_user,
complete_time, client, batch_no, ident_no, collection_type,
repay_status, over_days, remind,
tel_phone,
tel_name, new_money, module, result, delete_flag, create_time,
values
#{name}, #{caseId}, #{expectTime}, #{dept}, #{seqno}, #{caseType}, #{archiveNo}, #{cardNo}, #{account}, #{caseDate}, #{contractDate}, #{resultId}, #{targetName}, #{relation}, #{collectInfo}, #{collectTime}, #{mobile}, #{telType}, #{area}, #{mobile}, #{odv}, #{remark},
#{expectTime}, #{caseType}, #{newCase}, #{caseAllotTime}, #{caseStatus},
#{accountAge}, #{enRepayAmt}, #{payName}, #{payMethod}, #{confimName},
#{confimTime}, #{money}, #{balance}, #{mVal}, #{nextFollDate},
#{lastFollDate}, #{countFollow}, #{lastPhoneTime}, #{leaveDays},
#{reduceAmt}, #{reduceStatus}, #{reduceUpdateTime}, #{reduceReferTime},
#{color}, #{bailDate}, #{measure}, #{method}, #{repayTime},
#{bankTime}, #{bankAmt}, #{repayAmt}, #{collectStatus}, #{completeUser},
#{completeTime}, #{client}, #{batchNo}, #{identNo}, #{collectionType},
#{repayStatus}, #{overDays}, #{remind},
#{telPhone},
#{telName}, #{newMoney}, #{module}, #{result}, 0, now(),
mapper.delete: update data_collection set delete_flag =1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id,dept,create_time as createTime from data_collection
delete_flag = 0
AND dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update data_collection set collect_status = #{collectStatus} where batch_no = #{batchNo} and ident_no = #{identNo}
mapper.select:
select count(id) as sum from data_collection
delete_flag = 0
AND dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND area like CONCAT('%',#{area},'%')
AND odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
AND measure like CONCAT('%',#{measure},'%')
AND measure like CONCAT('%',#{collectMeasure},'%')
and client in
#{item}
and batch_no in
#{item}
AND case_status like CONCAT('%',#{caseStatus},'%')
AND result like CONCAT('%',#{result},'%')
AND ident_no like CONCAT('%',#{identNo},'%')
AND card_no like CONCAT('%',#{cardNo},'%')
AND collect_info like CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo},'%')
AND color like CONCAT('%',#{color},'%')
AND seqno like CONCAT('%',#{seqno},'%')
AND target_name like CONCAT('%',#{targetName},'%')
and account_age = #{accountAge}
and ident_no = #{identNo}
and collect_status = #{collectStatus}
and case_type = #{caseType}
and archive_no = #{archiveNo}
and new_case = #{newCase}
and repay_status = #{repayStatus}
and remark = #{remark}
AND tel_name like CONCAT('%',#{telName},'%')
AND tel_phone like CONCAT('%',#{telPhone},'%')
AND tel_phone like CONCAT('%',#{collectPhoneAddr},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(case_allot_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseAllotTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(case_allot_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseAllotTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(next_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{nextFollDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(next_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{nextFollDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(last_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastFollDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(last_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastFollDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(bail_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bailStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(bail_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{bailEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(collect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{collectStartTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(collect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{collectEndTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(case_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(case_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(money, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{moneyStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(money, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{moneyEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select t.name,t.account,t.card_no as cardNo,t.ident_no as identNo,t.archive_no as archiveNo,t.seq_no as seqNo,t.account_age as accountAge,t.money,t.residual_principle as residualPrinciple, c.target_name as targetName,c.relation,c.tel_phone as collectPhoneAddr,c.tel_type as contractType, c.result,t.odv,c.method,c.collect_status,t.pro_repay_date as proRepayDate,t.pro_repay_amt as proRepayAmt, c.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,c.reduce_status as reduceStatus,c.collect_info as collectInfo,t.over_days as overDays,t.batch_no as batchNo, t.case_date as caseDate,t.expect_time as expectTime,c.new_money as newMoney,t.province,t.city,t.county,t.currency_type as currencyType, t.apply_order_no as applyOrderNo,t.overdue_money as overdueMoney,t.remark,c.next_foll_date as nextFollDate,t.minimum_payment as minimumPayment, t.credit_line as creditLine,c.module from data_collection c LEFT JOIN data_case t on c.case_id = t.id where c.id in
#{item}

select t.name,t.account,t.card_no as cardNo,t.ident_no as identNo,t.archive_no as archiveNo,t.seq_no as seqNo,t.account_age as accountAge,t.money,t.residual_principle as residualPrinciple, c.target_name as targetName,c.relation,c.tel_phone as collectPhoneAddr,c.tel_type as contractType, c.result,t.odv,c.method,c.collect_status,t.pro_repay_date as proRepayDate,t.pro_repay_amt as proRepayAmt, c.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,c.reduce_status as reduceStatus,c.collect_info as collectInfo,t.over_days as overDays,t.batch_no as batchNo, t.case_date as caseDate,t.expect_time as expectTime,c.new_money as newMoney,t.province,t.city,t.county,t.currency_type as currencyType, t.apply_order_no as applyOrderNo,t.overdue_money as overdueMoney,t.remark,c.next_foll_date as nextFollDate,t.minimum_payment as minimumPayment, t.credit_line as creditLine,c.module from data_collection c LEFT JOIN data_case t on c.case_id = t.id
c.delete_flag = 0 and t.delete_flag = 0
AND c.dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND t.collect_area like CONCAT('%',#{area},'%')
and t.odv in
#{item}
AND c.measure like CONCAT('%',#{measure},'%')
and t.client in
#{item}
AND t.status like CONCAT('%',#{caseStatus},'%')
AND c.result like CONCAT('%',#{result},'%')
and t.batch_no in
#{item}
AND t.card_no like CONCAT('%',#{cardNo},'%')
AND c.collect_info like CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo},'%')
AND t.color like CONCAT('%',#{color},'%')
AND t.seq_no like CONCAT('%',#{seqno},'%')
AND c.target_name like CONCAT('%',#{targetName},'%')
and t.account_age = #{accountAge}
and t.ident_no = #{identNo}
and c.collect_status = #{collectStatus}
and t.case_type = #{caseType}
and t.archive_no = #{archiveNo}
and c.new_case = #{newCase}
and c.repay_status = #{repayStatus}
and c.remark = #{remark}
AND c.tel_name like CONCAT('%',#{telName},'%')
AND c.tel_phone like CONCAT('%',#{collectPhoneAddr},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.next_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{nextFollDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.next_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{nextFollDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.last_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastFollDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.last_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastFollDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.bail_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bailStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.bail_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{bailEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.collect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{collectStartTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.collect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{collectEndTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.case_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.case_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.money, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{moneyStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.money, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{moneyEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by c.${orderBy} ${sort}

select t.name,t.account,t.card_no as cardNo,t.ident_no as identNo,t.archive_no as archiveNo,t.seq_no as seqNo,t.account_age as accountAge,t.money,t.residual_principle as residualPrinciple, c.target_name as targetName,c.relation,c.tel_phone as collectPhoneAddr,c.tel_type as contractType, c.result,t.odv,c.method,c.collect_status,t.pro_repay_date as proRepayDate,t.pro_repay_amt as proRepayAmt, c.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,c.reduce_status as reduceStatus,c.collect_info as collectInfo,t.over_days as overDays,t.batch_no as batchNo, t.case_date as caseDate,t.expect_time as expectTime,c.new_money as newMoney,t.province,t.city,t.county,t.currency_type as currencyType, t.apply_order_no as applyOrderNo,t.overdue_money as overdueMoney,t.remark,c.next_foll_date as nextFollDate,t.minimum_payment as minimumPayment, t.credit_line as creditLine,c.module from data_collection c LEFT JOIN data_case t on c.case_id = t.id where t.batch_no in
#{item}

select t.name,t.account,t.card_no as cardNo,t.ident_no as identNo,t.archive_no as archiveNo,t.seq_no as seqNo,t.account_age as accountAge,t.money,t.residual_principle as residualPrinciple, c.target_name as targetName,c.relation,c.tel_phone as collectPhoneAddr,c.tel_type as contractType, c.result,t.odv,c.method,c.collect_status,t.pro_repay_date as proRepayDate,t.pro_repay_amt as proRepayAmt, c.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,c.reduce_status as reduceStatus,c.collect_info as collectInfo,t.over_days as overDays,t.batch_no as batchNo, t.case_date as caseDate,t.expect_time as expectTime,c.new_money as newMoney,t.province,t.city,t.county,t.currency_type as currencyType, t.apply_order_no as applyOrderNo,t.overdue_money as overdueMoney,t.remark,c.next_foll_date as nextFollDate,t.minimum_payment as minimumPayment, t.credit_line as creditLine,c.module from data_collection c LEFT JOIN data_case t on c.case_id = t.id where c.case_id in
#{item}

SELECT dc.batch_no as batchNo,dc.target_name as targetName,dc.seqno,dc.client,dc.account_age as accountAge, dc.money,dc.m_val as mVal,dc.bank_amt as bankAmt,dc.bank_time as bankTime, IFNULL(dc.bank_amt*dc.m_val,0) as repaidAmtM, IFNULL(dc.repay_amt*dc.m_val,0) as repaidBankAmtM, dc.repay_amt as repayAmt, dc.repay_time as repayTime,dc.en_repay_amt as enRepayAmt, dc.expect_time as expectTime,dc.pay_name as payName,dc.pay_method as payMethod,dc.confim_name as confimName, dc.confim_time as confimTime from data_collection dc where dc.delete_flag = 0
AND target_name like CONCAT('%',#{targetName},'%')
AND dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
and odv in
#{item}
and client in
#{item}
and batch_no in
#{item}
and account_age = #{accountAge}
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMATd(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT count(1) as sum from data_collection dc where dc.delete_flag = 0
AND target_name like CONCAT('%',#{targetName},'%')
AND dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
and odv in
#{item}
and client in
#{item}
and batchNo in
#{item}
and account_age = #{accountAge}
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMATd(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT IFNULL(sum(dc.en_repay_amt),0) as paidMoney , IFNULL(sum(dc.bank_amt),0) as bankAmtC, IFNULL(sum(dc.repay_amt),0) as repayAmtP, IFNULL(sum(dc.en_repay_amt*dc.m_val),0) as repaidAmt,IFNULL(sum(dc.bank_amt*dc.m_val),0) as repaidBankAmt from data_collection dc where dc.delete_flag = 0
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{monthStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{monthEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
AND client like CONCAT('%',#{client},'%')
and batch_no = #{batchNo}
and account_age = #{accountAge}
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMATd(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update data_collection set color = #{color} where case_id = #{caseId}
update data_collection set collect_status = #{collectStatus} where case_id = #{caseId}
mapper.select: select id,measure,collect_time as collectTime,target_name as targetName,relation,tel_phone as telPhone,collection_type as collectionType, result,target_name as targetName,method,repay_time as repayTime,repay_amt as repayAmt,reduce_amt as reduceAmt,reduce_status as reduceStatus,odv,collect_status as collectStatus, batch_no as batchNo,ident_no as identNo from data_collection where case_id = #{caseId}

select id,measure,collect_time as collectTime,target_name as targetName,relation,tel_phone as telPhone,collection_type as collectionType, result,target_name as targetName,method,repay_time as repayTime,repay_amt as repayAmt,reduce_amt as reduceAmt,reduce_status as reduceStatus,odv,collect_status as collectStatus from data_collection

select id,measure,collect_time as collectTime,target_name as targetName,relation,tel_phone as telPhone,collection_type as collectionType, result,target_name as targetName,method,repay_time as repayTime,repay_amt as repayAmt,reduce_amt as reduceAmt,reduce_status as reduceStatus,odv,collect_status as collectStatus from data_collection

select id,measure,collect_time as collectTime,target_name as targetName,relation,tel_phone as telPhone,collection_type as collectionType, result,target_name as targetName,method,repay_time as repayTime,repay_amt as repayAmt,reduce_amt as reduceAmt,reduce_status as reduceStatus,odv,collect_status as collectStatus from data_collection
